General.Name: Indomobil Multi Jasa Tbk
General.Description: PT Indomobil Multi Jasa Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, provides financial, and car rental and related services in Indonesia. It offers various financing services; and vehicle rental, trucking, driver, inspection, training, repair and maintenance, and logistics and transportation services, as well as sells fuel. The company was formerly known as PT Multi Tambang Abadi and changed its name to PT Indomobil Multi Jasa Tbk in February 2013. The company was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Jakarta Timur, Indonesia. PT Indomobil Multi Jasa Tbk operates as a subsidiary of PT Indomobil Sukses Internasional Tbk.

1.Name: Mr. Gunawan  Effendi
1.Title: VP Director and Accounting & Fin. Director
